   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File    : install_SUITE.erl
   23: %%% Author  : Rickard Green
   24: %%% Description : 
   25: %%%
   26: %%% Created : 12 Jan 2010 by Rickard Green
   27: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(install_SUITE).
   29: 
   30: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: -export([bin_default/1,
   35: 	 bin_default_dirty/1,
   36: 	 bin_outside_eprfx/1,
   37: 	 bin_outside_eprfx_dirty/1,
   38: 	 bin_unreasonable_path/1,
   39: 	 bin_not_abs/1,
   40: 	 'bin white space'/1,
   41: 	 bin_no_srcfile/1,
   42: 	 bin_unreachable_absolute/1,
   43: 	 bin_unreachable_relative/1,
   44: 	 bin_same_dir/1,
   45: 	 bin_ok_symlink/1,
   46: 	 bin_dirname_fail/1,
   47: 	 bin_no_use_dirname_fail/1]).
   48: 
   49: -define(JOIN(A,B,C), filename:join(A, B, C)).
   50: 
   51: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   52: 
   53: -record(inst, {mkdirs = true,
   54: 	       symlinks = true,
   55: 	       cmd_prefix = "",
   56: 	       ln_s = "ln -s",
   57: 	       test_prefix = "",
   58: 	       destdir = "",
   59: 	       extra_prefix = "",
   60: 	       exec_prefix = "",
   61: 	       bindir = "",
   62: 	       erlang_bindir = "",
   63: 	       bindir_symlinks = ""}).
   64: 
   65: need_symlink_cases() ->
   66:     [bin_unreachable_absolute, bin_unreachable_relative,
   67:      bin_same_dir, bin_ok_symlink, bin_dirname_fail,
   68:      bin_no_use_dirname_fail].
   69: 
   70: dont_need_symlink_cases() ->
   71:     [bin_default, bin_default_dirty, bin_outside_eprfx,
   72:      bin_outside_eprfx_dirty, bin_not_abs,
   73:      bin_unreasonable_path, 'bin white space',
   74:      bin_no_srcfile].
   75: 
   76: suite() ->
   77:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   78:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   79: 
   80: all() ->
   81:     dont_need_symlink_cases() ++ need_symlink_cases().
   82: 
   83: %%
   84: %% The test cases
   85: %%
   86: 
   87: bin_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     E = "/usr/local",
   89:     Bs = "/usr/local/bin",
   90:     Be = Bs,
   91:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
   92:     EBe = EBs,
   93:     RP = "../lib/erlang/bin",
   94:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
   95: 			     destdir = D,
   96: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
   97: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
   98: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
   99: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  100: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  101: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  102: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  103: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  104: 				 {false, _} ->
  105: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  106: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  107: 				 {true, "absolute"} ->
  108: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  109: 				 {true, _} ->
  110: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}}
  111: 			       end,
  112: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  113: 	     end,
  114:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  115: 			      bindir = Bs,
  116: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  117: 
  118: bin_default_dirty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     E = "/usr/./local/lib/..",
  120:     Bs = "/usr/local//lib/../lib/erlang/../../bin",
  121:     Be = "/usr/local/lib/../lib/erlang/../../bin",
  122:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/../lib/erlang/../erlang/bin/x/y/../..//",
  123:     EBe = "/usr/local/lib/../lib/erlang/../erlang/bin/x/y/../..",
  124:     RP = "../lib/erlang/bin",
  125:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  126: 			     destdir = D,
  127: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  128: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  129: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  130: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  131: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  132: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  133: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  134: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  135: 				 {false, _} ->
  136: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  137: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  138: 				 {true, "absolute"} ->
  139: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  140: 						B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  141: 				 {true, _} ->
  142: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}}
  143: 			       end,
  144: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  145: 	     end,
  146:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  147: 			      bindir = Bs,
  148: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  149: 
  150: 
  151: bin_outside_eprfx(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     E = "/usr/local",
  153:     Bs = "/usr/bin",
  154:     Be = Bs,
  155:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
  156:     EBe = EBs,
  157:     RP = "../local/lib/erlang/bin",
  158:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  159: 			     destdir = D,
  160: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  161: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  162: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  163: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  164: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  165: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  166: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  167: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  168: 				 {false, _} ->
  169: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  170: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  171: 				 {true, "relative"} ->
  172: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}};
  173: 				 {true, _} ->
  174: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}}
  175: 			       end,
  176: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  177: 	     end,
  178:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  179: 			      bindir = Bs,
  180: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  181: 
  182: 
  183: bin_outside_eprfx_dirty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     E = "/usr/local/lib/..",
  185:     Bs = "/usr/local/lib/../../bin",
  186:     Be = Bs,
  187:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
  188:     EBe = EBs,
  189:     RP = "../local/lib/erlang/bin",
  190:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  191: 			     destdir = D,
  192: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  193: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  194: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  195: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  196: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  197: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  198: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  199: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  200: 				 {false, _} ->
  201: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  202: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  203: 				 {true, "relative"} ->
  204: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}};
  205: 				 {true, _} ->
  206: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}}
  207: 			       end,
  208: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  209: 	     end,
  210:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  211: 			      bindir = Bs,
  212: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  213: 
  214: bin_unreasonable_path(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  215:     E = "/usr/local/../../..",
  216:     Bs = "/usr/local/../../../bin",
  217:     Be = Bs,
  218:     EBs = "/usr/local/../../../bin_unreasonable_path/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
  219:     EBe = EBs,
  220:     RP = "../bin_unreasonable_path/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
  221:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  222: 			     destdir = D,
  223: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  224: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  225: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  226: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  227: 		     Expct = case {TP, SL, BSL} of
  228: 				 {_, false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  229: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  230: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  231: 				 {_, false, _} ->
  232: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  233: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  234: 				 {"", true, "relative"} ->
  235: 				     {error, unreasonable_path};
  236: 				 {"", true, _} ->
  237: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  238: 				 {_, true, "absolute"} ->
  239: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  240: 				 _ ->
  241: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}}
  242: 			       end,
  243: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  244: 	     end,
  245:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  246: 			      bindir = Bs,
  247: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  248: 
  249: bin_unreachable_absolute(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  250:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  251:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/usr/bin"),
  252:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin"),
  253:     Erl = join([TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin/erl"]),
  254:     Erlc = join([TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin/erlc"]),
  255:     make_dirs(TDir, "/usr/local/lib"),
  256:     make_dirs(TDir, "/usr/local/bin"),
  257:     ok = file:write_file(Erl, "erl"),
  258:     ok = file:write_file(Erlc, "erlc"),
  259:     ok = file:make_symlink("../../../opt/local/lib/erlang/usr",
  260: 			   join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang"])),
  261:     E = "/usr/local",
  262:     Bs = "/usr/local/bin",
  263:     Be = Bs,
  264:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/../bin",
  265:     EBe = EBs,
  266:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  267: 			     destdir = D,
  268: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  269: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  270: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  271: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  272: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  273: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  274: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  275: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  276: 				 {false, _} ->
  277: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  278: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  279: 				 {true, "relative"} ->
  280: 				     {error, unreachable_absolute};
  281: 				 {true, _} ->
  282: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}}
  283: 			       end,
  284: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  285: 	     end,
  286:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  287: 			      bindir = Bs,
  288: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  289: 
  290: bin_unreachable_relative(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  291:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  292:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin"),
  293:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/bin"),
  294:     make_dirs(TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin"),
  295:     Erl = join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin/erl"]),
  296:     Erlc = join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin/erlc"]),
  297:     ok = file:write_file(Erl, "erl"),
  298:     ok = file:write_file(Erlc, "erlc"),
  299:     ok = file:make_symlink("../../opt/local/bin",
  300: 			   join([TDir, "/usr/local/bin"])),
  301: 
  302:     E = "/usr/local",
  303:     Bs = "/usr/local/bin",
  304:     Be = Bs,
  305:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
  306:     EBe = EBs,
  307:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  308: 			     destdir = D,
  309: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  310: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  311: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  312: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  313: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  314: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  315: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  316: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  317: 				 {false, _} ->
  318: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  319: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  320: 				 {true, "relative"} ->
  321: 				     {error, unreachable_relative};
  322: 				 {true, _} ->
  323: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}}
  324: 			       end,
  325: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  326: 	     end,
  327:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  328: 			      bindir = Bs,
  329: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  330: 
  331: bin_ok_symlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  332:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  333:     make_dirs(TDir, "/usr/local/bin"),
  334:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin"),
  335:     Erl = join([TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin/erl"]),
  336:     Erlc = join([TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin/erlc"]),
  337:     ok = file:write_file(Erl, "erl"),
  338:     ok = file:write_file(Erlc, "erlc"),
  339:     ok = file:make_symlink("../../opt/local/lib",
  340: 			   join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib"])),
  341:     E = "/usr/local",
  342:     Bs = "/usr/local/bin",
  343:     Be = Bs,
  344:     EBs = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin",
  345:     EBe = EBs,
  346:     RP = "../lib/erlang/bin",
  347:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  348: 			     destdir = D,
  349: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  350: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  351: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  352: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  353: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  354: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  355: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  356: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  357: 				 {false, _} ->
  358: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  359: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  360: 				 {true, "absolute"} ->
  361: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  362: 				 {true, _} ->
  363: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}}
  364: 			       end,
  365: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  366: 	     end,
  367:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  368: 			      bindir = Bs,
  369: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  370: 
  371: bin_same_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  372:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  373:     make_dirs(TDir, "/usr/local/bin"),
  374:     make_dirs(TDir, "/usr/local/lib"),
  375:     ok = file:make_symlink("..", join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang"])),
  376:     Erl = join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin/erl"]),
  377:     Erlc = join([TDir, "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin/erlc"]),
  378:     ok = file:write_file(Erl, "erl"),
  379:     ok = file:write_file(Erlc, "erlc"),
  380:     ChkRes = fun (Res, _) ->
  381: 		     expect({error, target_and_source_same_dir}, Res)
  382: 	     end,
  383:     install_bin(Config,
  384: 		#inst{mkdirs = false,
  385: 		      exec_prefix = "/usr/local",
  386: 		      bindir = "/usr/local/bin",
  387: 		      erlang_bindir = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin"},
  388: 		ChkRes).
  389: 
  390: bin_not_abs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  391:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP}) ->
  392: 		     case TP of
  393: 			 "" ->
  394: 			     expect({error, {not_abs, 'bindir'}}, Res);
  395: 			 _ ->
  396: 			     B = join([TP, "/usr/local/bin"]),
  397: 			     {ok, {relative, B, "../lib/erlang/bin"}}
  398: 		     end
  399: 	     end,
  400:     install_bin(Config,
  401: 		#inst{exec_prefix = "/usr/local",
  402: 		      bindir = "usr/local/bin",
  403: 		      erlang_bindir = "/usr/local/lib/erlang/bin"},
  404: 		ChkRes).
  405: 
  406: 
  407: 'bin white space'(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  408:     E = "/u s r/local",
  409:     Bs = "/u s r/local/b	i	n",
  410:     Be = Bs,
  411:     EBs = "/u s r/local/lib/erl	ang/bin",
  412:     EBe = EBs,
  413:     RP = "../lib/erl	ang/bin",
  414:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  415: 			     destdir = D,
  416: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  417: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  418: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  419: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  420: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  421: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  422: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  423: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  424: 				 {false, _} ->
  425: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  426: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  427: 				 {true, "absolute"} ->
  428: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  429: 				 {true, _} ->
  430: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}}
  431: 			       end,
  432: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  433: 	     end,
  434:     install_bin(Config, #inst{exec_prefix = E,
  435: 			      bindir = Bs,
  436: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  437: 
  438: bin_dirname_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  439:     E = "/opt",
  440:     Bs = "/opt/lib/../bin",
  441:     Be = Bs,
  442:     EBs = "/opt/lib/erlang/otp/bin",
  443:     EBe = EBs,
  444:     CMDPRFX = "PATH=\""++proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config)++":"++os:getenv("PATH")++"\"",
  445:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  446: 			     destdir = D,
  447: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  448: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  449: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  450: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  451: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  452: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  453: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  454: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  455: 				 {false, _} ->
  456: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  457: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  458: 				 {true, "relative"} ->
  459: 				     {error, dirname_failed};
  460: 				 {true, _} ->
  461: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}}
  462: 			       end,
  463: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  464: 	     end,
  465:     install_bin(Config, #inst{cmd_prefix = CMDPRFX,
  466: 			      exec_prefix = E,
  467: 			      bindir = Bs,
  468: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  469: 
  470: bin_no_use_dirname_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  471:     E = "/opt",
  472:     Bs = "/opt/bin",
  473:     Be = Bs,
  474:     EBs = "/opt/lib/erlang/otp/bin",
  475:     EBe = EBs,
  476:     RP = "../lib/erlang/otp/bin",
  477:     CMDPRFX = "PATH=\""++proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config)++":"++os:getenv("PATH")++"\"",
  478:     ChkRes = fun (Res, #inst{test_prefix = TP,
  479: 			     destdir = D,
  480: 			     extra_prefix = EP,
  481: 			     bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  482: 			     symlinks = SL}) ->
  483: 		     B = join([TP, D, EP, Be]),
  484: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  485: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  486: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  487: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  488: 				 {false, _} ->
  489: 				     {ok,{absolute,
  490: 						B,join([TP,D,EP,EBe])}};
  491: 				 {true, "absolute"} ->
  492: 				     {ok,{absolute,B,join([TP,EP,EBe])}};
  493: 				 {true, _} ->
  494: 				     {ok,{relative,B,RP}}
  495: 			       end,
  496: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  497: 	     end,
  498:     install_bin(Config, #inst{cmd_prefix = CMDPRFX,
  499: 			      exec_prefix = E,
  500: 			      bindir = Bs,
  501: 			      erlang_bindir = EBs}, ChkRes).
  502: 
  503: bin_no_srcfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  504:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  505:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/bin"),
  506:     make_dirs(TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin"),
  507:     Erl = join([TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin/erl"]),
  508:     ok = file:write_file(Erl, "erl"),
  509:     Erlc = join([TDir, "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin/erlc"]),
  510:     RP_Erlc = "../lib/erlang/bin/erlc",
  511:     ChkRes = fun (Res,  #inst{bindir_symlinks = BSL,
  512: 			      symlinks = SL}) ->
  513: 		     Expct = case {SL, BSL} of
  514: 				 {false, _} when BSL == "relative";
  515: 						 BSL == "absolute" ->
  516: 				     {error, no_ln_s};
  517: 				 {false,_} ->
  518: 				     {error,{no_srcfile, Erlc}};
  519: 				 {true, "absolute"} ->
  520: 				     {error,{no_srcfile, Erlc}};
  521: 				 {true, _} ->
  522: 				     {error,{no_srcfile, RP_Erlc}}
  523: 			     end,
  524: 		     expect(Expct, Res)
  525: 	     end,
  526:     install_bin(Config,
  527: 		#inst{mkdirs = false,
  528: 		      exec_prefix = "/opt/local",
  529: 		      bindir = "/opt/local/bin",
  530: 		      erlang_bindir = "/opt/local/lib/erlang/bin"},
  531: 		ChkRes).
  532: 
  533: %%
  534: %% Auxiliary functions
  535: %%
  536: 
  537: expect(X, X) ->
  538:     io:format("result: ~tp~n", [X]),
  539:     io:format("-----------------------------------------------~n", []),
  540:     ok;
  541: expect(X, Y) ->
  542:     io:format("expected: ~tp~n", [X]),
  543:     io:format("got     : ~tp~n", [Y]),
  544:     io:format("-----------------------------------------------~n", []),
  545:     ct:fail({X,Y}).
  546: 
  547: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  548:     PD = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  549:     SymLinks = case os:type() of
  550:                    {win32, _} -> false;
  551:                    _ ->
  552:                        case file:make_symlink("nothing",
  553:                                               filename:join(PD, "symlink_test")) of
  554:                            ok -> true;
  555:                            _ -> false
  556:                        end
  557:                end,
  558:     [{symlinks, SymLinks} | Config].
  559: 
  560: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  561:     ok.
  562: 
  563: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  564:     init_per_testcase_aux(proplists:get_value(symlinks,Config),
  565:                           os:type(),Case,Config).
  566: 
  567: init_per_testcase_aux(_, {win32, _}, _Case, _Config) ->
  568:     {skip, "Not on windows"};
  569: init_per_testcase_aux(false, OsType, Case, Config) ->
  570:     case lists:member(Case, need_symlink_cases()) of
  571: 	false -> init_per_testcase_aux(true, OsType, Case, Config);
  572: 	true -> {skip, "Cannot create symbolic links"}
  573:     end;
  574: init_per_testcase_aux(true, _OsType, Case, Config) ->
  575:     [{testcase, Case},
  576:      {test_dir, make_dirs(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), atom_to_list(Case))}
  577:      | Config].
  578: 
  579: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  580:     ok.
  581: 
  582: make_dirs(Root, Suffix) ->
  583:     do_make_dirs(Root, string:lexemes(Suffix, [$/])).
  584: 
  585: do_make_dirs(_Root, []) ->
  586:     "";
  587: do_make_dirs(Root, [D|Ds]) ->
  588:     Dir = filename:join(Root, D),
  589:     case file:make_dir(Dir) of
  590: 	{error, eexist} -> ok;
  591: 	ok -> ok;
  592: 	Err -> exit({make_dir, Err})
  593:     end,
  594:     filename:join(Dir, do_make_dirs(Dir, Ds)).
  595: 
  596: install_bin(Config, #inst{mkdirs = MkDirs,
  597: 			  exec_prefix = EXEC_PREFIX,
  598: 			  bindir = BINDIR,
  599: 			  erlang_bindir = ERLANG_BINDIR} = Inst, ChkRes) ->
  600:     PDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  601:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  602:     TD = atom_to_list(proplists:get_value(testcase, Config)),
  603:     case MkDirs of
  604: 	false -> ok;
  605: 	true ->
  606: 	    make_dirs(TDir, EXEC_PREFIX),
  607: 	    make_dirs(TDir, BINDIR),
  608: 	    make_dirs(TDir, ERLANG_BINDIR),
  609: 	    Erl = join([TDir, ERLANG_BINDIR, "/erl"]),
  610: 	    Erlc = join([TDir, ERLANG_BINDIR, "/erlc"]),
  611: 	    ok = file:write_file(Erl, "erl"),
  612: 	    ok = file:write_file(Erlc, "erlc")
  613:     end,
  614: 
  615:     install_bin2(Config, Inst#inst{destdir = TDir}, ChkRes),
  616:     install_bin2(Config, Inst#inst{extra_prefix = TDir}, ChkRes),
  617:     install_bin2(Config, Inst#inst{destdir = PDir,
  618: 				   extra_prefix = "/"++TD}, ChkRes),
  619:     install_bin2(Config,
  620: 		 Inst#inst{test_prefix = TDir,
  621: 			   exec_prefix = join([TDir, EXEC_PREFIX]),
  622: 			   bindir = join([TDir, BINDIR]),
  623: 			   erlang_bindir = join([TDir, ERLANG_BINDIR])},
  624: 		 ChkRes),
  625:     case proplists:get_value(symlinks, Config) of
  626: 	true -> ok;
  627: 	false -> {comment, "No symlink tests run, since symlinks not working"}
  628:     end.
  629: 
  630: 
  631: install_bin2(Config, Inst, ChkRes) ->
  632:     install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = false,
  633: 				   ln_s = "ln"}, ChkRes),
  634:     install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = false,
  635: 				   ln_s = "ln",
  636: 				   bindir_symlinks = "relative"}, ChkRes),
  637:     install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = false,
  638: 				   ln_s = "ln",
  639: 				   bindir_symlinks = "absolute"}, ChkRes),
  640:     install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = false,
  641: 				   ln_s = "cp -p"}, ChkRes),
  642:     install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = false,
  643: 				   ln_s = "cp -p",
  644: 				   bindir_symlinks = "relative"}, ChkRes),
  645:     install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = false,
  646: 				   ln_s = "cp -p",
  647: 				   bindir_symlinks = "absolute"}, ChkRes),
  648:     case proplists:get_value(symlinks, Config) of
  649: 	true ->
  650: 	    install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = true,
  651: 					   ln_s = "ln -s"}, ChkRes),
  652: 	    install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = true,
  653: 					   ln_s = "ln -s",
  654: 					   bindir_symlinks = "relative"}, ChkRes),
  655: 	    install_bin3(Config, Inst#inst{symlinks = true,
  656: 					   ln_s = "ln -s",
  657: 					   bindir_symlinks = "absolute"}, ChkRes);
  658: 	false ->
  659: 	    ok
  660:     end.
  661: 
  662: install_bin3(Config,
  663: 		 #inst{cmd_prefix = CMD_PRFX,
  664: 		       ln_s = LN_S,
  665: 		       destdir = DESTDIR,
  666: 		       extra_prefix = EXTRA_PREFIX,
  667: 		       exec_prefix = EXEC_PREFIX,
  668: 		       bindir = BINDIR,
  669: 		       erlang_bindir = ERLANG_BINDIR,
  670: 		       bindir_symlinks = BINDIR_SYMLINKS} = Inst,
  671: 		 ChkRes) ->
  672:     Test = proplists:get_value(testcase, Config),
  673:     DDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  674:     TDir = proplists:get_value(test_dir, Config),
  675:     InstallBin = filename:join(DDir, "install_bin"),
  676:     ResFile = filename:join(TDir, atom_to_list(Test) ++ "-result.txt"),
  677:     Cmd = CMD_PRFX ++ " "
  678: 	++ InstallBin ++ " --ln_s \"" ++ LN_S
  679: 	++ "\" --destdir \"" ++ DESTDIR
  680: 	++ "\" --extra-prefix \"" ++ EXTRA_PREFIX
  681: 	++ "\" --bindir-symlinks \"" ++ BINDIR_SYMLINKS
  682: 	++ "\" --bindir \"" ++ BINDIR
  683: 	++ "\" --erlang-bindir \"" ++ ERLANG_BINDIR
  684: 	++ "\" --exec-prefix \"" ++ EXEC_PREFIX
  685: 	++ "\" --test-file \"" ++ ResFile ++ "\" erl erlc",
  686: 
  687:     io:format("CMD_PRFX        = \"~ts\"~n"
  688: 	      "LN_S            = \"~ts\"~n"
  689: 	      "BINDIR_SYMLINKS = \"~ts\"~n"
  690: 	      "exec_prefix     = \"~ts\"~n"
  691: 	      "bindir          = \"~ts\"~n"
  692: 	      "erlang_bindir   = \"~ts\"~n"
  693: 	      "EXTRA_PREFIX    = \"~ts\"~n"
  694: 	      "DESTDIR         = \"~ts\"~n",
  695: 	      [CMD_PRFX, LN_S, BINDIR_SYMLINKS, EXEC_PREFIX, BINDIR,
  696: 	       ERLANG_BINDIR, EXTRA_PREFIX, DESTDIR]),
  697: 
  698:     io:format("$ ~ts~n", [Cmd]),
  699:     CmdOutput = os:cmd(Cmd),
  700:     io:format("~ts~n", [CmdOutput]),
  701:     ChkRes(case file:consult(ResFile) of
  702: 	       {ok, [Res]} -> Res;
  703: 	       Err -> exit({result, Err})
  704: 	   end,
  705: 	   Inst).
  706: 
  707: join("") ->
  708:     "";
  709: join([""|Ds]) ->
  710:     join(Ds);
  711: join([D|Ds]) ->
  712:     "/" ++ string:trim(D, both, [$/]) ++ join(Ds).
